title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 5.5 - The use of mixtures, milk rinsings, milk drippings, whey and milk fat and other milk solids recovered therefrom
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 5.5 - The use of mixtures, milk rinsings, milk drippings, whey and milk fat and other milk solids recovered therefrom

State Regulations

Mixtures, milk rinsings, milk drippings, whey and milk fat
and other milk solids recovered therefrom may be used in: (a) products in the manufacture of which milk
fat, other milk solids and water are permitted ingredients; or
(b) in the manufacture of butter and skimmed
milk powder (nonfat dry milk solids). Except as provided herein, no milk rinsings or mixture or
product thereof shall be sold or used as human food. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง
5.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
